name: Lightning Field
description: An area of frequent lightning strikes creates a dangerous but potentially powerful energy source, while the constant electrical activity can charge magical items or create unique phenomena. The risk of being struck makes it deadly, but the energy can be harnessed by those with proper protection.
atmosphere: Frequent lightning strikes create dangerous but powerful energy source. Air charged with electricity and ozone scent. Constant electrical activity can charge magical items. Risk of being struck makes it deadly. Energy can be harnessed with proper protection. Constant lightning creates natural power and energy sense.
